description: Delete and Amazon Q in Connect AI Prompt version.

parameters.name: assistantId
parameters.description: The identifier of the Amazon Q in Connect assistant. Can be either the ID or the ARN. URLs cannot contain the ARN.

parameters.name: aiPromptId
parameters.description: The identifier of the Amazon Q in Connect AI prompt.

parameters.name: versionNumber
parameters.description: The version number of the AI Prompt version to be deleted.
